mapper.sql: pk_queue_id, ordinal, window_name, agent, business_type, a_certificates_type, a_name, a_Idcard, b_certificates_type, b_name, b_Idcard, get_time, start_time, end_time, remarks, is_vip, idCard, serial_number
mapper.select: select * from t_hall_queue where pk_queue_id = #{pkQueueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_hall_queue
pk_queue_id,
ordinal,
window_name,
agent,
idCard,
business_type,
a_certificates_type,
a_name,
a_Idcard,
b_certificates_type,
b_name,
b_Idcard,
get_time,
start_time,
end_time,
remarks,
is_vip,
serial_number,
DAOBAN_PEOPLE,
DAOBAN_IDCARD,
EVALUATE,
#{pkQueueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ordinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{windowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aCertificatesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bCertificatesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{getTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{startTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{endTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isVip,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{daobanPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{daobanIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_hall_queue
ordinal = #{ordinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
window_name = #{windowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent = #{agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idCard = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a_certificates_type = #{aCertificatesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a_name = #{aName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a_Idcard = #{aIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
b_certificates_type = #{bCertificatesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
b_name = #{bName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
b_Idcard = #{bIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
get_time = #{getTime,jdbcType=DATE},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VIP = #{isVip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pk_queue_id = #{pkQueueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from t_hall_queue

select count(*) from t_hall_queue where 1 = 1
and ordinal like '%${ordinal}%'
and window_name like '%${windowName}%'
and agent like '%${agent}%'
and business_type like '%${businessType}%'
and remarks is null
and remarks = '办结'
and remarks = '空号'
and remarks = '退号'
and remarks like '%正在办理%'
and is_vip = '1'
and b_name like '%${bName}%'
and B_IDCARD like '%${bIdcard}%'
and TO_CHAR(get_time,'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
and get_time >= #{queryStart}
and get_time <= #{queryEnd}

select t.* from ( select rownum rn, u.* from t_hall_queue u where rownum <= #{endRow,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and ordinal like '%${ordinal}%'
and window_name like '%${windowName}%'
and agent like '%${agent}%'
and business_type like '%${businessType}%'
and remarks is null
and remarks = '办结'
and remarks = '空号'
and remarks = '退号'
and remarks like '%正在办理%'
and is_vip = '1'
and b_name like '%${bName}%'
and B_IDCARD like '%${bIdcard}%'
and TO_CHAR(get_time,'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
and get_time >= #{queryStart}
and get_time <= #{queryEnd}
) t where t.rn >= #{startRow,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT * FROM t_hall_queue WHERE ordinal= #{Ordinal} AND to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char (sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND is_vip !=1

SELECT a.type_name as businessType, NVL(b.num,0)as nowWaitNum FROM t_sys_businessType a LEFT JOIN (SELECT business_type,COUNT(*) as num from t_hall_queue WHERE remarks is null and to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char (sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY business_type) b on a.type_name=b.business_type ORDER BY type_name

SELECT to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') as countDate, COUNT(*) as totalNum, trunc(AVG((start_time-get_time)*86400)) as avgWaitTime, COUNT(DECODE(SIGN(${serviceOverTime}-(end_time-start_time)*86400),-1, 1, null)) as waitOverTimeNum, trunc(AVG((end_time-start_time)*86400)) as avgServiceTime , COUNT(DECODE(SIGN(${waitOverTime}-(start_time-get_time)*86400),-1, 1, null)) as serviceOverTimeNum from t_hall_queue WHERE remarks = '办结' and to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= '${queryStart}' and to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')<='${queryEnd}' GROUP BY to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')
SELECT * FROM t_hall_queue WHERE to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= '${startTime}' AND to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') <='${endTime}'
SELECT agent,window_name,COUNT(*)as totalCount FROM t_hall_queue WHERE to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= '${queryStart}' AND to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')<='${queryEnd}' GROUP BY agent,window_name

SELECT agent,window_name,business_type,COUNT(business_type)as realCount FROM t_hall_queue WHERE to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= '${queryStart}' AND to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')<='${queryEnd}' AND remarks='办结' GROUP BY agent,window_name,business_type

SELECT agent,window_name,COUNT(*)as nullCount FROM t_hall_queue WHERE to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= '${queryStart}' AND to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')<='${queryEnd}' AND remarks='空号' GROUP BY agent,window_name

SELECT agent,window_name,COUNT(*)as backCount FROM t_hall_queue WHERE to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= '${queryStart}' AND to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')<='${queryEnd}' AND remarks='退号' GROUP BY agent,window_name
select count(DISTINCT(ORDINAL)) from t_hall_queue where b_Idcard = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(get_time,'yyyy') = to_char (sysdate,'yyyy') and a_Idcard is null and remarks ='办结'
select count(DISTINCT(ORDINAL)) from t_hall_queue where a_Idcard = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(get_time,'yyyy') = to_char (sysdate,'yyyy') and remarks ='办结'
SELECT * FROM t_hall_queue WHERE remarks = #{windowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char (sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and rownum = 1

SELECT * FROM t_hall_queue t WHERE t.get_time = (SELECT MAX(t.get_time) FROM t_hall_queue t where ordinal = #{ordinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char (sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND remarks is null AND ordinal = #{ordinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum = 1

SELECT a.window_name, NVL(b.num,0)as realCount FROM t_sys_window a LEFT JOIN (SELECT window_name,COUNT(*) as num from t_hall_queue WHERE remarks='办结' and to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= '${queryStart}' and to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')<='${queryEnd}' GROUP BY window_name) b on a.window_name=b.window_name ORDER BY window_name

SELECT a.window_name, NVL(b.num,0)as realCount,a.operator_people as agent FROM t_sys_window a LEFT JOIN (SELECT window_name,COUNT(DISTINCT(ordinal)) as num from t_hall_queue WHERE remarks is not null and to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char (sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY window_name) b on a.window_name=b.window_name ORDER BY window_name

SELECT a.type_name AS businessType, NVL( b.num, 0 ) AS realCount, NVL( c.num, 0 ) AS nullCount FROM t_sys_businessType a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT business_type, COUNT(DISTINCT(ordinal)) AS num FROM t_hall_queue WHERE remarks is not null AND to_char( get_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) = to_char( SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) GROUP BY business_type ) b ON a.type_name = b.business_type LEFT JOIN ( SELECT business_type, COUNT( * ) AS num FROM t_hall_queue WHERE remarks IS NULL AND to_char( get_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) = to_char( SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) GROUP BY business_type ) c ON a.type_name = c.business_type ORDER BY type_name

SELECT agent,COUNT(DISTINCT(ordinal)) as realCount, TRUNC(AVG(end_time-start_time)*86400) as avgServiceTime, COUNT(DECODE(SIGN(${serviceOverTime}-(end_time-start_time)*86400),-1, 1, null)) as serviceOverTimeNum from t_hall_queue WHERE remarks is not null and to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= '${queryStart}' and to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')<='${queryEnd}' GROUP BY agent

SELECT agent,idCard,COUNT(*) as realCount, TRUNC(AVG(end_time-start_time)*86400) as avgServiceTime, COUNT(DECODE(SIGN(${serviceOverTime}-(end_time-start_time)*86400),-1, 1, null)) as overTimeNum from t_hall_queue WHERE remarks='办结' and to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= '${queryStart}' and to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')<='${queryEnd}' GROUP BY agent,idCard

select * from (select rownum rn, u.* from t_hall_queue u where to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and start_time is not null order by start_time desc) t where rownum <#{endRow,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.rn >0

select count(DISTINCT(ordinal)) from t_hall_queue where to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and get_time between to_date('${queryStart}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${queryEnd}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

select count(DISTINCT(ordinal)) from t_hall_queue where to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and end_time between to_date('${queryStart}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${queryEnd}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
select count(*) from (SELECT count(*) from T_HALL_QUEUE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(GET_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') ) t

SELECT b.* from (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* from ( SELECT TO_CHAR(T.GET_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "countDate", COUNT(*) as "totalCount", trunc(AVG((start_time-get_time)*86400)) as "avgWaitTime", COUNT(DECODE(SIGN(${serviceOverTime}-(end_time-start_time)*86400),-1, 1, null)) as "waitOverTimeNum", trunc(AVG((end_time-start_time)*86400)) as "avgServiceTime", COUNT(DECODE(SIGN(${waitOverTime}-(start_time-get_time)*86400),-1, 1, null)) as "serviceOverTimeNum" FROM T_HALL_QUEUE T where REMARKS = '办结'
and to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= '${queryStart}'
and to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')<='${queryEnd}'
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(T.GET_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(T.GET_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') ASC NULLS LAST ) a WHERE rownum <= #{endRow,jdbcType=INTEGER}) b WHERE b.rn >= #{startRow,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT count(DISTINCT(ORDINAL)) FROM T_HALL_QUEUE where to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and REMARKS ='空号' and b_Idcard = #{bIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT count(DISTINCT(ORDINAL)) FROM T_HALL_QUEUE where to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and REMARKS ='退号' and b_Idcard = #{bIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT count(*) FROM T_HALL_QUEUE where to_char(get_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and REMARKS is null and BUSINESS_TYPE = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT business_type AS businessType, COUNT( * ) AS nowWaitNum FROM t_hall_queue WHERE remarks is null and START_TIME is null AND to_char( get_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) = to_char( SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) GROUP BY business_type

SELECT DAOBAN_IDCARD as idCard,DAOBAN_PEOPLE as agent,BUSINESS_TYPE as businessType,count(DISTINCT(ORDINAL)) as realCount FROM t_hall_queue where BUSINESS_TYPE in (SELECT DISTINCT BUSINESS_TYPE FROM t_hall_queue where DAOBAN_IDCARD in (select DISTINCT DAOBAN_IDCARD FROM T_HALL_QUEUE WHERE 1=1
and TO_CHAR(get_time,'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
and TO_CHAR(get_time,'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(#{queryStart},'YYYY-MM-DD')
) ) and DAOBAN_IDCARD in( select DISTINCT DAOBAN_IDCARD FROM T_HALL_QUEUE WHERE 1=1
and TO_CHAR(get_time,'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
and TO_CHAR(get_time,'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(#{queryStart},'YYYY-MM-DD')
)
and TO_CHAR(get_time,'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
and TO_CHAR(get_time,'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(#{queryStart},'YYYY-MM-DD')
GROUP BY DAOBAN_IDCARD,DAOBAN_PEOPLE,BUSINESS_TYPE
select B_NAME from T_HALL_QUEUE where B_IDCARD = #{bIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum = 1
select A_NAME from T_HALL_QUEUE where A_IDCARD = #{bIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum = 1
select A_NAME,A_IDCARD,B_IDCARD,END_TIME from T_HALL_QUEUE where A_IDCARD = #{aIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_HALL_QUEUE WHERE TO_CHAR(GET_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYY-MM-DD') and END_TIME is null
DELETE FROM T_HALL_QUEUE WHERE END_TIME is null
DELETE FROM T_HALL_QUEUE where REMARKS is null or REMARKS like '%正在办理%'
